title: More Xbox Games Come to PlayStation!
description:
Xbox games are going to PlayStation and Playstation games are going to Xbox! 

From this episode of KFGD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RtBuCnm-7EI  
Go to http://KindaFunny.com/MonsterHunterNow to play right now!

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
